channel.title: How could i change colors [look at post]
channel.description:
How could i make it so the yell title like [admin] is yellow then whatever the person says in yell is a different color? like.. [ADMIN]: whatever the person says in yell
}else if (c.playerRights == 1){ c2.sendMessage("[Mod]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

item.title: How could i change colors [look at post]
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:

for pi its this

} else { if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && !muted && playerRights == 2) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("[@red@Admin@yel@]"+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) text.substring(1));
